ud1.7:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati ajakalāpake cetiye, ajakalāpakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
ud1.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattandhakāratimisāyaṃ abbhokāse nisinno hoti;
ud1.7:1.5: Atha kho ajakalāpako yakkho bhagavato bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato avidūre tikkhattuṃ “akkulo pakkulo”ti akkulapakkulikaṃ akāsi:
ud1.7:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
